channel.title: How do I Make .DAT Files GZipped?
channel.description: I was wondering how i can convert dat files into gz files since i have dual blood blades that are in dat format and when i try loading them on my server it crashes cause it has a error unzipping it (I tried various methods but kept crashing...) Thanks!

item.title: How do I Make .DAT Files GZipped?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If you drag and drop to gzip, you’ll get ‘name.dat.gz’ , just delete the .dat to leave name.gz

Read full topic
item.source: How do I Make .DAT Files GZipped?

item.title: How do I Make .DAT Files GZipped?
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

You don’t need to unzip models that are gzipped as .Dat form.
The .zip/rar/gzip files will work just put them into your client’s “Model” folder.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I Make .DAT Files GZipped?
